name: Crazy Fishing
description: Expect the unexpected when you set out on an innocent fishing trip as Crazy Fishing pairs a challenging fishing experience with VR environmental interactions, exploration and discovery!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970, or AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: HTC Vive VR Headset
